name: Improvised Detox Salad
author: keralucu
summary: I had planned to go on a 3-day juice detox but my juicer died the morning I was due to start so I was stuck with a whole load of fruit and veg. I threw together this salad using the ingredients that were to go into one of the juices. It turned out surprisingly yummy and looked gorgeous. This is definitely a salad for those who like their food on the tart side but the sweetness of the red apple balances it out nicely.
ingredients: ½ small red onion, very thinly sliced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon toasted pine nuts, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Combine green apple, red apple, yellow bell pepper, cucumber, beet, and carrot in a large bowl
Stir in onion, broccoli stem, celery, and parsley
Add olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper
